scoreboard-tweaks.scoreboard-scale.descr: Scales the scoreboard by the specified amount.
scoreboard-tweaks.max-lines.description: The max number of lines for the scoreboard to display.
scoreboard-tweaks.remove-only-sequential: Remove the score only when the numbers are sequential. This means the numbers won't show when on, for example, Hypxiel lobbies where they only exist for ordering the components.
scoreboard-tweaks.add-header-text-shadow: Add shadow to the header text.
scoreboard-tweaks.add-body-text-shadow.d: Add shadow to the body text.
scoreboard-tweaks.add-number-text-shadow: Add shadow to the number text.
scoreboard-tweaks.move-horizontally.desc: Moves the scoreboard horizontally in the x direction.
scoreboard-tweaks.move-vertically.descri: Moves the scoreboard vertically in the y direction.
